attributes.action: stop councils racially descriminating against the ethnic English identity by not allowing the Cross of St George to be flown on all public buildings on April 23rd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand that some councils will not be flying the Cross of St George on April 23rd. This is racist.
The English do not object to the Scottish/Irish/Welsh flags being flown on their pubic buildings--We just want fairness for the Englsh to do likewise.

rejection.details: It is not clear from your petition that councils chosing not to fly  St George's Flag is evidence of discrimination against the English.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
